description: Veridia is the embodiment of dark nobility and a high-ranking commander within the ruthless Crimson Empire...

abilities.ability_name: Runic Aegis of the Obsidian Circle
abilities.ability_description: Veridia completes the forbidden ritual, causing the ancient Obsidian Sigil beneath her to burst forth in a searing circle of void energy...
Harnessing the turbulent atmosphere of the Shadowlands, Veridia unleashes a devastating, channeled assault...
Veridia summons a swirling vortex of raw void energy, pulling debris, shadows, and arcane essence toward her hand...
Channeling her connection to the forbidden runic circle, Veridia materializes a colossal serpent made of pure umbral energy...
Veridia ascends into a state of transcendence, becoming the living conduit of the ancient sigil beneath her...

description: Tarik is a formidable warrior of the Northern Clans, distinguished by his immense strength and discipline...

abilities.ability_description: Tarik calls down celestial lightning to strike his massive hammer...
Tarik raises his hammer to the heavens, opening a temporary portal...
Tarik slams his hammer to the ground and channels the power of the runic circle beneath him...
Tarik embraces the storm, allowing lightning to engulf him...
As the culmination of Tarik's storm mastery, he summons a spectral, colossal thunder hydra...

description: Volkan is a master of the flame, a warrior whose very existence feels like an impending eruption...

abilities.ability_description: Volkan channels pure solar fire and seismic power directly into his armored gauntlet...
Volkan plunges his connection to the fiery rune-circle beneath him...
Wielding his colossal, rune-engraved hammer, Volkan slams it down...
Volkan assumes a ritualistic stance, drawing raw, chaotic fire from the heart of the earth...
Volkan taps into the ultimate power of the runic sigil, ascending from the ground...

description: Little is known of the entity called Kaelus. It is believed to be a vessel of an ancient spirit or a Golem...

abilities.ability_description: Kaelus manifests a colossal, glowing shield forged from pure lightning...
Kaelus channels his runic power into a massive, star-shaped spectral hammer...
Kaelus conjures a swirling vortex of glowing, runic daggers that orbit him...
Kaelus raises his runic shield, which is immediately encircled by a rapidly spinning ring of pure azure energy...
Focusing the energy of the Obsidian Circle beneath him, Kaelus slams his fist into the ground...
